content: meet aurora the little cat she dressed the beautiful yellow skirt and she absolutely loves her blue-yellow flower materials 2 5 mm of 2 75mm crochet hook i used 2 5 mm cotton yarn i used catania from schachenmayr in cream 130 light blue 173 light yellow 403 blue 261 yellow 280 black and pink embroidery thread safety eyes 8 00 mm stuffing yarn needle stitch marker i used thin black thread the finished toy is about 15 cm in sitting positions pattern available in english us *please do not copy or redistribute this pattern or claim it as your own you may sell your finished items if you like but please credit rnata shop as the designer thanks *
